attributes.action: Honour Bruce Forthsyth with a Knight hood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it’s shocking that this 79 year old entertainer who still presents prime time television is not honored for his life time’s work. A CBE is not enough, he deserves more then most to recive a Knight Hood.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
